member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS
member.summary: Identifies the type of file information that should retrieve or should set.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileBasicInfo
member.summary: Minimal information for the file should be retrieved or set. Used for file handles. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileStandardInfo
member.summary: Extended information for the file should be retrieved. Used for file handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileNameInfo
member.summary: The file name should be retrieved. Used for any handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileRenameInfo
member.summary: The file name should be changed. Used for file handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileDispositionInfo
member.summary: The file should be deleted. Used for any handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileAllocationInfo
member.summary: The file allocation information should be changed. Used for file handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileEndOfFileInfo
member.summary: The end of the file should be set. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileStreamInfo
member.summary: File stream information for the specified file should be retrieved. Used for any handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileCompressionInfo
member.summary: File compression information should be retrieved. Used for any handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileAttributeTagInfo
member.summary: File attribute information should be retrieved. Used for any handles. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileIdBothDirectoryInfo
member.summary: Files in the specified directory should be retrieved. Used for directory handles. Use only when calling. The number of files returned for each call toGetFileInformationByHandleEx depends on the size of the buffer that is passed to the function. Any subsequent calls toGetFileInformationByHandleEx on the same handle will resume the enumeration operation after the last file is returned. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileIdBothDirectoryRestartInfo
member.summary: Identical to FileIdBothDirectoryInfo, but forces the enumeration operation to start again from the beginning. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileIoPriorityHintInfo
member.summary: Priority hint information should be set. Use only when calling. See.

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.FileRemoteProtocolInfo
member.summary: File remote protocol information should be retrieved. Use for any handles. Use only when calling. See.

summary.para: Files in the specified directory should be retrieved. Used for directory handles. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
Identical to FileFullDirectoryInfo, but forces the enumeration operation to start again from the beginning. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
File storage information should be retrieved. Use for any handles. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
File alignment information should be retrieved. Use for any handles. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
File information should be retrieved. Use for any handles. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
Files in the specified directory should be retrieved. Used for directory handles. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
Identical to FileIdExtdDirectoryInfo, but forces the enumeration operation to start again from the beginning. Use only when calling. See.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012

member.name: FILE_INFO_BY_HANDLE_CLASS.MaximumFileInfoByHandleClass
member.summary: This value is used for validation. Supported values are less than this value.
